text: Speaker 1: 'Should we repay you?' Speaker 2: 'There is no charge for awesomeness, or attractiveness.'
Speaker 1: 'I wonder, Bob, if you can handle my car?' Speaker 2: 'It's an ordinary six cylinder.'
Speaker 1: 'Did you order the code red?' Speaker 2: 'You're goddamn right.'
Speaker 1: 'You've seen rain before... right?' Speaker 2: 'We don't get out much.'
Speaker 1: 'Does anyone know how to pick a lock?' Speaker 2: 'Sure. Picking locks is my thing.'
Speaker 1: 'Are there more like you?' Speaker 2: 'Dead. All dead. Long time.'
Speaker 1: 'That's what you're afraid of isn't it?' Speaker 2: 'You bet I am.'
Speaker 1: 'I can't believe how much similar you both look. Are you related?' Speaker 2: 'People are always assuming that we are related.'
Speaker 1: 'Do you think he did the theft?' Speaker 2: 'He is as innocent as a lamb.'
Speaker 1: 'Is everyone comfortable?' Speaker 2: 'Everyone is on pins and needles.'
Speaker 1: 'Did she look pretty?' Speaker 2: 'She was as cute as a kitten.'
Speaker 1: 'Do you have an answer?' Speaker 2: 'Absolutely.'
Speaker 1: 'This is a costume?' Speaker 2: 'Aaaiyyyy... worked on it all night long!'
Speaker 1: 'Do you think you will be able to finish your report by five o'clock today?' Speaker 2: 'Not a chance. I'll be busy in meetings all day.'
Speaker 1: 'Do you want some extra pepper in the lasagne?' Speaker 2: 'Why do you want to ruin it?'
Speaker 1: 'Do you think your parents will be angry?' Speaker 2: 'My parents are going to kill me when they find out.'
Speaker 1: 'Are you married?' Speaker 2: 'I'm divorced.'
Speaker 1: 'Exactly the way it was?' Speaker 2: 'Down to the last slime-covered toadstool.'
Speaker 1: 'Do you suppose I was dropped on my head?' Speaker 2: 'I hope not.'
Speaker 1: 'Is it much farther?' Speaker 2: 'Do you ever say something that isn't a stupid question?'
Speaker 1: 'Can you drive that far?' Speaker 2: 'Can fish swim?'
Speaker 1: 'Can I get the money now?' Speaker 2: 'Ahh, maybe next summer.'
Speaker 1: 'Aren't you scared?' Speaker 2: 'Well, that's just fine.'
Speaker 1: 'You took my photo off the ofrenda?!' Speaker 2: 'It was an accident!'
Speaker 1: 'You're leaving?' Speaker 2: 'It has been a pleasure my queen.'
Speaker 1: 'Mind if I leave my umbrella here in the hallway?' Speaker 2: 'Not at all. But first shake it outside. Would you?'
Speaker 1: 'Can I help you with that?' Speaker 2: 'Why thank you!'
Speaker 1: 'Will you be staying in Gotham for a while?' Speaker 2: 'As far as I know.'
Speaker 1: 'It does what you tell it?' Speaker 2: 'Well, sort of.'
Speaker 1: 'You sure this'll happen?' Speaker 2: 'It's in the cards.'
Speaker 1: 'Would he be able to recite the song?' Speaker 2: 'Do dogs bark?'
Speaker 1: 'Is that a big mall?' Speaker 2: 'That mall is large enough to have its own zip code.'
Speaker 1: 'Don't you stay for a nightcap?' Speaker 2: 'I've gotta get up early.'
Speaker 1: 'You have it, then?' Speaker 2: 'I had to slit a few throats to get it.'
Speaker 1: 'Oh, so this is the best kind?' Speaker 2: 'It's the cheapest.'
Speaker 1: 'Have I done something to offend you?' Speaker 2: 'I like all you Navy boys.'
Speaker 1: 'Is it too costly?' Speaker 2: 'You are breaking the bank.'
Speaker 1: 'Are you going to talk to Mark?' Speaker 2: 'I have a bone to pick with Mark.'
Speaker 1: 'Can you tell my future from these stars?' Speaker 2: 'The stars don't tell the future, donkey. They tell stories.'
Speaker 1: 'Is your neighbour old?' Speaker 2: 'Older than dirt.'
Speaker 1: 'Should I water your plants while you are away?' Speaker 2: 'Thanks for the offer, but Mark already said that he will have an eye on them.'
Speaker 1: 'Did you report private Barnes to your superiors?' Speaker 2: 'I remember thinking very highly of private Barnes, and not wanting to see his record tarnished by a formal charge.'
Speaker 1: 'Is he a careful investor?' Speaker 2: 'He never puts all of his eggs in one basket.'
Speaker 1: 'Do you think you can give me a ride home?' Speaker 2: 'A friend in need is a friend indeed.'
Speaker 1: 'Do you recommend that I talk with the boss?' Speaker 2: 'I would advise against it.'
Speaker 1: 'Could you understand the sketch?' Speaker 2: 'It is as clear as mud.'
Speaker 1: 'Aren't you suppose to be in bed?' Speaker 2: 'We couldn't sleep.'
Speaker 1: 'Are you the owner of this place?' Speaker 2: 'The owners are in Australia.'
Speaker 1: 'Do you love me?' Speaker 2: 'My love for you is as deep as the ocean.'
Speaker 1: 'So they're not going to hurt us?' Speaker 2: 'Does it look like any of them are trying to hurt you?'
Speaker 1: 'C-can you can you unlock it?' Speaker 2: 'Not in a million years. But it wouldn't matter.'
Speaker 1: 'Could you help Bob and me plan a surpise party for Meg?' Speaker 2: 'What can I do?'
Speaker 1: 'Could he hit?' Speaker 2: 'Lifetime 356 average. Third highest in history.'
Speaker 1: 'Does it bother you that the machine stops working like that?' Speaker 2: 'I'm used to it.'
Speaker 1: 'Don't you ever think about having a family?' Speaker 2: 'Right now, you're my family.'
Speaker 1: 'Did you build that?' Speaker 2: 'But it's seriously messed up.'
Speaker 1: 'Are you with me?' Speaker 2: 'To the death!'
Speaker 1: 'This is large. Will this suit her?' Speaker 2: 'She's as thin as a toothpick.'
Speaker 1: 'Any sign?' Speaker 2: 'Something's going to happen out there. I can feel it.'
Speaker 1: 'Is it that obvious?' Speaker 2: 'Well, you do kinda stand out.'
Speaker 1: 'Did he pass the exam? ' Speaker 2: 'Does a monkey build a house?'
Speaker 1: 'Are you angry at me?' Speaker 2: 'To err is human, to forgive divine.'
Speaker 1: 'Are you all right?' Speaker 2: 'Perfect! Never been better.'
Speaker 1: 'Did you ask her?' Speaker 2: 'I've done everything possible short of asking her.'
Speaker 1: 'Is the job going to be easy?' Speaker 2: 'You have big shoes to fill.'
Speaker 1: 'Don't you do the shopping yourself?' Speaker 2: 'No shopping or laundry or housekeeping. I am a professional nanny.'
Speaker 1: 'Are you hungry?' Speaker 2: 'Maybe we can grab a bite on the way.'
Speaker 1: 'Is there anything wrong with her?' Speaker 2: 'Oh, she's just pretending.'
Speaker 1: 'Does he work hard?' Speaker 2: 'He has never done a lick of work in his life.'
Speaker 1: 'It's bad isn't it?' Speaker 2: 'We should get you to the doctor.'
Speaker 1: 'Are you a Dodgers' fan?' Speaker 2: 'I don't like baseball.'
Speaker 1: 'Are you planning to buy a house?' Speaker 2: 'I really want a place to call my own.'
Speaker 1: 'You're gonna be seeing a lot of me. You're sure you don't mind?' Speaker 2: 'It's good what you're doing.'
Speaker 1: 'Do you have a cold?' Speaker 2: 'We're allergic to youth.'
Speaker 1: 'Was that easy to negotiate?' Speaker 2: 'That is as easy as shooting fish in a barrel.'
Speaker 1: 'And marriage, does that get easier?' Speaker 2: 'It's hard. We started going to a marriage counselor.'
Speaker 1: 'Are you sure that I should do it?' Speaker 2: 'You've got to do what you've got to do.'
Speaker 1: 'Do I have to attend this interview?' Speaker 2: 'Do you want to be a success in this world?'
Speaker 1: 'Is it a good product?' Speaker 2: 'They had put a lot of thought into making it.'
Speaker 1: 'Is the dress perfect?' Speaker 2: 'It fits like a glove.'
Speaker 1: 'Are you going to spend your vacation in New York this year?' Speaker 2: 'Actually I have a different destination in mind.'
Speaker 1: 'Do you mean the girl by the fire? ' Speaker 2: 'The girl with a torch.'
Speaker 1: 'Seagull? What? Oh - you went up to the surface again, didn't you? Didn't you?' Speaker 2: 'Nothing... happened...'
Speaker 1: 'Did she put on weight?' Speaker 2: 'She is as thin as a rake.'
Speaker 1: 'You've seen it?' Speaker 2: 'It's top secret but he's been telling me about it.'
Speaker 1: 'Are you still waiting for Bob?' Speaker 2: 'I don't know why I bother. The store wll be closed by the time we get there.'
Speaker 1: 'And does Abu have anything else to say?' Speaker 2: 'Well, uh, he wishes there was something he could do to help.'
Speaker 1: 'Would you like to hear it?' Speaker 2: 'I'd be so grateful.'
Speaker 1: 'Perhaps it can be improved?' Speaker 2: 'No problem!'
Speaker 1: 'Are you sure?' Speaker 2: 'It's a known fact.'
Speaker 1: 'Is there a bus I can get to the station.' Speaker 2: 'You can't rely on it.'
Speaker 1: 'Didn't he work for the Church?' Speaker 2: 'Almost exclusively.'
Speaker 1: 'Can we look around in your camper?' Speaker 2: 'I'll give you the royal tour.'
Speaker 1: 'Do you love eating that?' Speaker 2: 'It is one of my favourite meals.'
Speaker 1: 'Do you know where the bus stop is?' Speaker 2: 'Actually I am pretty new to this area.'
Speaker 1: 'Do you like that theory?' Speaker 2: 'Sounds good. Let's move on.'
Speaker 1: 'It seems Cathy is not happy at all with her new room mate. Did you ask her why?' Speaker 2: 'Believe me. I tried to find out. But I simply could not pin it down.'
Speaker 1: 'Are you a morning person?' Speaker 2: 'I'm more of a night owl.'
Speaker 1: 'Did they speak in turns?' Speaker 2: 'One after the other.'
Speaker 1: 'They grow up so fast, don't they?' Speaker 2: 'Too fast.'
